subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A second-half hat trick by Cristiano Ronaldo took Portugal to the World Cup finals with a 4-2 aggregate victory in its World Cup playoff against Sweden on Tuesday.
snippet: A second-half hat trick by Cristiano Ronaldo took Portugal to the World Cup finals with a 4-2 aggregate victory in its World Cup playoff against Sweden on Tuesday.
